Interface Controller

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    BookController

    public interface Controller
    Interface Controller acts as the controller of this eBook application. This controller specifies the core functionality of this application.
    Version:
    29/10/2015
    Author:
    S H S Wong

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.lang.String getChapter(int volumeNumber, int chapterNumber)
      Returns the text in the specified chapter.
      java.lang.String getLinesWithWord(java.lang.String word)
      Returns the lines of text in which the specified word can be found.
      java.lang.String getNextChapter()
      Returns the text in the next chapter.
      java.lang.String getPreviousChapter()
      Returns the text in the previous chapter.
      int getTotalOccurrences(java.lang.String word)
      Returns the total number of times a specified word occurs in the text.

    • Method Detail

      • getPreviousChapter

        java.lang.String getPreviousChapter()
        Returns the text in the previous chapter.
        Returns:
        the result as a string; or null if the current chapter is the first chapter of the book.

      • getNextChapter

        java.lang.String getNextChapter()
        Returns the text in the next chapter.
        Returns:
        the result as a string; or null if the current chapter is the last chapter of the book.

      • getChapter

        java.lang.String getChapter(int volumeNumber,
                          int chapterNumber)
        Returns the text in the specified chapter.
        Parameters:
        volumeNumber - the number of the required volume
        chapterNumber - the number of the required chapter
        Returns:
        the result as a string; or null if the specified chapter does not exist

      • getLinesWithWord

        java.lang.String getLinesWithWord(java.lang.String word)
        Returns the lines of text in which the specified word can be found.
        Parameters:
        word - the word to be found
        Returns:
        the result as a string; or null if the specified word does not exist

      • getTotalOccurrences

        int getTotalOccurrences(java.lang.String word)
        Returns the total number of times a specified word occurs in the text.
        Parameters:
        word - the word to be found
        Returns:
        the results an an integer
